H0.text: What automotive manufacturer's badge logo has since 1925 featured a diamond, mostly as an 'impossible optical illusion' geometric 3D frame. Citroen

H1.text: What automotive manufacturer's badge logo has since 1925 featured a diamond, mostly as an 'impossible optical illusion' geometric 3D frame. Peugeot

H2.text: What automotive manufacturer's badge logo has since 1925 featured a diamond, mostly as an 'impossible optical illusion' geometric 3D frame. Fiat

H3.text: What automotive manufacturer's badge logo has since 1925 featured a diamond, mostly as an 'impossible optical illusion' geometric 3D frame. Renault

A4.text: The rhomboid logo was introduced in 1968

A5.text: The bonnet badge changed from circular to the familiar and continuing diamond shape in 1925

A6.text: The transformed logo maintained the diamond shape
